original_text: They will deal with you in hatred and take away everything you have worked for. They will leave you stark naked, and the shame of your prostitution will be exposed. Your lewdness and promiscuity
korean_text: 그들이 미워하는 마음으로 네게 행하여 네 모든 수고한 것을 빼앗고 너를 벌거벗은 몸으로 두어서 네 음행의 벗은 몸 곧 네 음란하며 행음하던 것을 드러낼 것이라

sentences.original_text: They will deal with you in hatred
and take away everything you have worked for
sentences.korean_translation: 네가 일한 모든 것을 가져갈 것이다

sentences.original_text: They will leave you stark naked
and the shame of your prostitution will be exposed
